Samuel George Canavan

  1. Foster Name: Samuel C.
  2. Foster Family: Benjamin and Mary Elliott
  3. Location of Family: Wayne, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wayne, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: 1896-04-10, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1/31/1920, Omaha, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Katie Kearns
  11. Source: The Wayne Herald, 21 November 1901; Find-A-Grave for Samuel George Caravan; 1910 United States Federal Census.
